************************************************************************* events.t This module forms an optional part of the adv3Lite library. Note, however, that it must be present for certain other modules such as actor.t and scene.t to function properly, so it must be included if any of them are.

(c) 2012-13 Eric Eve (but based largely on code borrowed from the adv3 library (c) Michael J. Roberts).
